# Floodgate

The goal of floodgate is to provide inference on model-free variable importance. For more information about the package, visit: [https://luzhangh.github.io/floodgate][2]. For details about the methodology, check out our paper: Zhang, Lu, and Lucas Janson. "Floodgate: inference for model-free variable importance." arXiv preprint [arXiv:2007.01283][1] (2020).

## Installation

You can install the development version of floodgate from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("LuZhangH/floodgate")
```

[1]: https://arxiv.org/abs/2007.01283
[2]: https://luzhangh.github.io/floodgate
